In this episode, we start from GlotDict, a browser extension Daniele wrote to support WordPress translators. But that‚Äôs just the starting point! We‚Äôll touch on what is means to be a WordPress core contributor, how Mozilla is different from WordPress and the love/hate relationship we all have with PHP.

Daniele also wrote an Open Source book: ‚ÄúContribute to open source: the right way‚Äù. This book is like a survival guide for any Open Source newcomer. We‚Äôll talk about how the book came to be and what are the main takeaways from it.
